Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.toggle

Interface ToggleService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ToggleServiceImpl
public interface ToggleService
Provides an interface for interacting with toggle components in a UI automation framework, supporting operations to activate, deactivate, and verify toggle states. By leveraging ToggleComponentType and the DEFAULT_TYPE, implementations can manage various toggle behaviors (e.g., switches, checkboxes) with consistent methods across different UI designs.

Commonly relies on Selenium-based strategies to locate and manipulate toggles identified by container elements (SmartWebElement), text, or By locators.

Author:

  • Method Details

    • activate

      default void activate(SmartWebElement container, String toggleText)
      Activates the toggle with the specified text inside a container, using the default toggle component type.
      Parameters:
      container - The SmartWebElement container that contains the toggle.
      toggleText - The text of the toggle to activate.

    • activate

      toggleText - The text of the toggle to activate.

    • isEnabled

      default boolean isEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String toggleText)
      Checks if the toggle with the specified text inside a container is enabled, using the default toggle component type.
      Parameters:
      container - The SmartWebElement container that contains the toggle.
      toggleText - The text of the toggle to check.
      Returns:
      true if the toggle is enabled, false otherwise.

    • isEnabled
